package.name: asr_calibration_tool_dome
package.description: This package provides several tools for calibraiting the kinematic chain of the PdB-Dome. It provides a data-tracking for recording 6D positions of Flock of Birds data glove and a checkerboard mounted on it. So the kinematic chain is closed. The recorded data is written to a file and can be used for the asr_calibraition_tool_dome.
package.author: Heller Florian, Stöckle Patrick, Wittenbeck Valerij
